predicate.note: Frames file for 'extradite' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 10.2.

example.name: with destination
example.text: U.S. District Judge Jack B. Weinstein of Brooklyn, N.Y., ruled that a man implicated in an attack on an Israeli passenger bus in 1986 can be extradited [*-1] to Israel for trial.
example.arg: [*-1] -> a man implicated in an attack on an Israeli passenger bus in 1986

example.name: with source
example.text: Mary was extradited [*] from Lower Slobovia for the murder of John.
